%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#4a90d9', 'secondaryColor': '#f0f4f8', 'tertiaryColor': '#e8f4e8'}}}%% flowchart TB subgraph Entry["Entry Points"] LAUNCHER["launch_codex_orchestrator_session.ts
CLI launcher"] ORCHESTRATOR["index.ts
Main orchestrator"] TIMELINE["dynamic_timeline.ts
Status display"] end subgraph Config["Configuration Layer"] AGENTS_LARK["agents.lark
DSL config file"] AGENTLARK_COMPILER["agentlark (Rust)
Compiles .lark to JSON"] AGENTS_JSON["agents.out.json
Compiled config"] AGENTS_TS["agents.ts
Config loader & types"] CLI_ARGS["orchestrator_cli.ts
CLI argument parser"] end subgraph AIBackends["AI Backend Layer"] AI_INDEX["ai/index.ts
Backend factory"] CODEX_CLIENT["ai/openai/
Codex/OpenAI SDK"] MINIMAX_CLIENT["ai/anthropic/
MiniMax backend"] AI_TOOLS["ai/tools/
Tool definitions"] end subgraph Zellij["Zellij Integration"] ZELLIJ_CLIENT["zellij_client.ts
Session management"] ZELLIJ_CLI["zellij/cli.ts
CLI wrapper"] ZELLIJ_SESSIONS["zellij/sessions.ts
Layout & KDL generation"] ZELLIJ_TABS["zellij/tabs.ts
Tab management"] ZELLIJ_LAYOUTS["zellij/layouts.ts
Layout builders"] end subgraph Persistence["Persistence & Logging"] MEMORY_STORE["memory_store.ts
Artifact storage"] PROGRESS_TRACKER["progress_tracker.ts
Agent progress"] AGENTFS["agentfs/
FS logging system"] LOG_FILES["logs/*.log
Agent log files"] MEMORY_DIR["memory/
Memory artifacts"] end subgraph Orchestration["Orchestration Patterns"] direction TB WORKFLOW["Workflow
Sequential agents"] PARALLEL["Parallel
Concurrent execution"] RELAY["Relay
Graph-based routing"] ROUTER["Router
Dynamic routing"] EVAL_OPT["Evaluator-Optimizer
Iterative refinement"] end %% Entry flow LAUNCHER -->|"1. Parse args"| CLI_ARGS LAUNCHER -->|"2. Compile config"| AGENTLARK_COMPILER AGENTLARK_COMPILER -->|"Generates"| AGENTS_JSON LAUNCHER -->|"3. Build layout"| ZELLIJ_SESSIONS LAUNCHER -->|"4. Spawn"| ORCHESTRATOR LAUNCHER -->|"5. Launch"| ZELLIJ_CLIENT %% Config loading AGENTS_LARK -->|"Input"| AGENTLARK_COMPILER AGENTS_JSON -->|"Loaded by"| AGENTS_TS AGENTS_TS -->|"Provides agents"| ORCHESTRATOR CLI_ARGS -->|"Options"| ORCHESTRATOR %% Orchestrator main flow ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Creates client"| AI_INDEX AI_INDEX -->|"Codex backend"| CODEX_CLIENT AI_INDEX -->|"MiniMax backend"| MINIMAX_CLIENT ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Uses tools"| AI_TOOLS %% Orchestration patterns ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Executes"| WORKFLOW ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Executes"| PARALLEL ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Executes"| RELAY ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Executes"| ROUTER ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Executes"| EVAL_OPT %% Persistence ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Records progress"| PROGRESS_TRACKER ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Stores artifacts"| MEMORY_STORE ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Logs actions"| AGENTFS ORCHESTRATOR -->|"Writes"| LOG_FILES MEMORY_STORE -->|"Persists to"| MEMORY_DIR PROGRESS_TRACKER -->|"Writes to"| MEMORY_DIR %% Timeline TIMELINE -->|"Reads"| LOG_FILES TIMELINE -->|"Reads"| PROGRESS_TRACKER TIMELINE -->|"Reads"| MEMORY_STORE %% Zellij internals ZELLIJ_CLIENT --> ZELLIJ_CLI ZELLIJ_CLIENT --> ZELLIJ_TABS ZELLIJ_SESSIONS --> ZELLIJ_LAYOUTS classDef entry fill:#4a90d9,stroke:#2e5d8a,color:#fff classDef config fill:#f4a460,stroke:#cd853f,color:#000 classDef ai fill:#9370db,stroke:#6a5acd,color:#fff classDef zellij fill:#20b2aa,stroke:#008b8b,color:#fff classDef persist fill:#3cb371,stroke:#2e8b57,color:#fff classDef pattern fill:#ff69b4,stroke:#c71585,color:#fff class LAUNCHER,ORCHESTRATOR,TIMELINE entry class AGENTS_LARK,AGENTLARK_COMPILER,AGENTS_JSON,AGENTS_TS,CLI_ARGS config class AI_INDEX,CODEX_CLIENT,MINIMAX_CLIENT,AI_TOOLS ai class ZELLIJ_CLIENT,ZELLIJ_CLI,ZELLIJ_SESSIONS,ZELLIJ_TABS,ZELLIJ_LAYOUTS zellij class MEMORY_STORE,PROGRESS_TRACKER,AGENTFS,LOG_FILES,MEMORY_DIR persist class WORKFLOW,PARALLEL,RELAY,ROUTER,EVAL_OPT pattern

extra.repo_description: a multi-agent orchestration framework that autonomously decomposes complex prompts into actionable tasks through a specialized hierarchy of user-definable agents, orchestrating them across Zellij term
